column1: Baberu is a town and a nagar panchayat in Banda district  in the state of Uttar Pradesh
column2: India. It is one of four tehsils (subdistricts) of the Banda district.

column1: The nearest river that flows to this tehsil is the Yamuna
column2: which is 18 km away from this place. There is a major temple called Madidai Ka Mandir.

column1: It is connected to major cities by paved single lane roads
column2: and is about 130 km from Kanpur and 200 km from Lucknow
